data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi - Udinese kick-off to start the match.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Udinese to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 7, Hellas Verona are coming forward and Mattia Zaccagni gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Throw-in high up the field for Hellas Verona in Verona.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Hellas Verona are pushing forward but Mert Cetin's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
In Verona Udinese attack through Kevin Lasagna. The finish is off target, however.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Mamadou Coulibaly for Udinese gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Manuel Volpi awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 19, Free kick Udinese.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 21, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Udinese.
Manuel Volpi signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Udinese's half.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 24, Manuel Volpi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 32, Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Manuel Volpi signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Udinese's area.
Hellas Verona's Adrien Tameze breaks free at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 35, Manuel Volpi awards Udinese a goal kick.
Rodrigo De Paul of Udinese smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Udinese drive upfield and Mamadou Coulibaly gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
In the minute 37, Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Hellas Verona.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Verona to check on Matteo Lovato, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 40, Andrea Favilli is on a sub for Samuel Di Carmine for Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona's Matteo Lovato is back in action after a slight knock.
Stefano Okaka (Udinese) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 43, Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Verona.
Manuel Volpi awards the home team a throw-in.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Hellas Verona with the kick-off.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Udinese.
In the minute 47, Udinese's Sebastien De Maio is on target but unsuccessful.
Kevin Lasagna of Udinese gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Kevin Lasagna (Udinese) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Important block from the Hellas Verona defence as Mamadou Coulibaly fires in a strike for Udinese.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Udinese's Samir gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 51, Andrea Favilli for Hellas Verona has been booked by Manuel Volpi and receives a first yellow card.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 52, In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Manuel Volpi awards Udinese a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Hellas Verona pushes forward through Davide Faraoni, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
Goal! Hellas Verona have got their heads in front thanks to a Andrea Favilli strike.
Antonin Barak with an assist there.
In the minute 59, Free kick Udinese.
Hellas Verona's Federico Dimarco misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 62, Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a first substitution, with Fernando Forestieri replacing Tolgay Arslan.
Thomas Ouwejan is replacing Marvin Zeegelaar for Udinese at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Udinese are pushing forward but Kevin Lasagna's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Udinese.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Udinese's Rodrigo Becao gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Udinese.
In Verona Udinese attack through Rodrigo Becao. The finish is off target, however.
Manuel Volpi awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Udinese's Fernando Forestieri breaks free at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Throw-in Udinese.
In the minute 72, Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Udinese's half?
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Hellas Verona.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Ebrima Colley is replacing Mattia Zaccagni for the home team.
Luca Gotti is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi with Ilija Nestorovski replacing Sebastien De Maio.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Udinese have a goal kick.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Udinese.
Udinese are coming forward and Kevin Lasagna gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Manuel Volpi signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Udinese's half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
Hellas Verona's Ebrima Colley misses with an attempt on goal.
Manuel Volpi awards Udinese a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona's Andrea Favilli has run offside.
Pawel Dawidowicz of Hellas Verona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
Udinese's Ilija Nestorovski gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Manuel Volpi blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
The home team have replaced Adrien Tameze with Pawel Dawidowicz. This is the third substitution made today by Ivan Juric.
